about_the_game:
About the Game:

Dive into the thrilling underworld of covert operations with Stealth Raider, the ultimate stealth-action adventure. As a master thief, your skills in subterfuge, agility, and cunning are your greatest assets. Navigate through intricate mazes, ancient dungeons, and high-security vaults, each filled with treasures to plunder and dangers to avoid.

Key Features:

Dynamic Stealth Mechanics: Use shadows, disguises, and your environment to remain undetected. Each level presents unique challenges that require a strategic approach to avoid traps, outsmart guards, and bypass advanced security systems.


Diverse Levels: Explore a variety of stunning environments, from medieval castles and abandoned temples to modern high-tech facilities. Each level is meticulously designed with hidden paths, secret rooms, and valuable loot.


Challenging Puzzles: Engage your brain with complex puzzles that unlock new areas and treasures. Use your wits to solve ancient riddles, deactivate security systems, and open secret passages.


Upgrade Your Gear: Collect and utilize a range of gadgets and tools to aid your heists. From lockpicks and grappling hooks to advanced cloaking devices, customize your loadout to suit your playstyle.

Non-linear Gameplay: Choose your path and play your way. Whether you prefer a methodical, quiet approach or a daring, high-risk raid, Stealth Raider accommodates a variety of playstyles.


Immersive Storyline: Uncover a gripping narrative that takes you deep into a world of mystery and intrigue. Meet a cast of colorful characters, each with their own stories and secrets.

High Replay Value: With multiple routes, hidden secrets, and varying difficulty levels, each playthrough offers a new experience and fresh challenges.

Prepare yourself for an exhilarating journey into the shadows. Will you emerge as the ultimate Stealth Raider?

content_descriptors.notes: "Stealth Raider" includes action-packed gameplay where players may encounter situations involving combat with guards, as well as various traps and challenges. In the course of the game, players can defeat enemies or face in-game consequences, such as being caught in traps, which may lead to the character’s defeat or death. The game focuses on strategic thinking and quick reflexes to navigate these scenarios successfully.

name: Stealth Raider

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 or superior
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Navigate intricate mazes, ancient dungeons, and high-security vaults filled with traps, guards, and advanced security systems. Use your cunning, agility, and a variety of gadgets to outsmart enemies and solve complex puzzles. Wishlist Stealth Raider now and stay tuned for updates!
